name: ChillyQuest
description:
A platformer where you are a glass of water, adventuring to find ice cubes.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement (jumping and crouching)
  • Double Jumps, Wall Jumps and Crouch Jumps can all be performed
  • M to mute/unmute the music
  • Z to skip levels in the tutorial world (World 0)

This game was created, solo, for the My First Game Jam 2020

Check out my devlog here - https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2020/topic/662954/devlog-chily-quest
